meta.title: From YES to CHEF
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: This week we're honoring some of this year's Emmy nominees, including "The Bear", from which we all learned the phrase "Yes, Chef!"

ladder.clue: Something ^ didn't do, according to song?
Classic cartoon character whose last name could ^
Add a T to the start of ^ and it sounds like something you don't want to be in
Change a bigram (two consecutive letters) in ^ to a single vowel to get a musical term
Change one letter in ^ to get a shot-caller
The ^'s ^'s ^, etc., all the way to the top
What the first letter of ^ stands for
Drop the middle letter of ^ to get someone who can stand the heat?
